reviewText: Complete and utter tosh. To call this movie corny is an understatement. The German cast are second rate at best and it's dubbed into English. Almost, but not quite comical. Edgar Wallace's name is writ large on the front of the box, but underneath it...."and others he inspired" - well this must be one of the "others" and it was most definitely not inspired.
I love old German Krimi movies. "Welcome this is Edgar Wallace speaking " is something I look forward to hearing. Lol
